title: Prisoner of Paradise (2003) Kurt Gerron Terezin
description:
I am shocked to discover that "Prisoner of Paradise" search brings up only pornos at TPB.

Here is the real Prisoner of Paradise, actor and film-star Kurt Gerron. After fleeing Germany to pursue a stage career in Amsterdam, he was caught and sent to Terezin

This was an artists colony where talented people were offered a refuge in the middle of Nazi Germany - or was it?

No, of course the whole thing was a sham, just another step on the way to dusty death.

Gerron was a fascinating character in his own right, this documentary is worth seeing just for him.

Another youtube reseed in mp4 format.
